The basic [[Resource|resource]] '''Leather''' can be found at [[Quest|quests]] or can be crafted at the [[Workshop]] :Workshop:.
 Half of a leather hide folded over, cut down the middle and sewn at the chin, a simple cowl is produced. Brown and color and thin, it drapes over the sides of your head and covers your neck. With the benefit of being waterproof and light weight, its great for disguising or concealing your identity.

=Properties=
